trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger wishes to introduce you to a means of acquiring superior arms.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_SEQ_01<tab>Urianger has arranged for a merchant in Mor Dhona to accept the ritual foci as fair exchange for a unique weapon. Take the three primal trophies you collected, and trade them to Rowena at Revenant's Toll.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_SEQ_02<tab>After scrutinizing the uncanny objects of bone, Rowena appears satisfied that they will sell for a handsome sum. Deliver the ritual tools to Laraina, the merchant's acquisitions officer, and formalize the transaction.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_SEQ_03<tab>You deliver the primal trophies to Laraina, and receive three tokens in exchange. With such tokens in your possession, you are now able to make a selection from Rowena's stock of high-quality armaments. Laraina explains that should you wish to obtain more of their weapons, you need only bring her another set of “stomach-churning” ritual foci.
TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_TODO_00<tab>Take the three ritual foci to Rowena at Revenant's Toll in Mor Dhona.
TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the three ritual foci to Laraina.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_URIANGER_000_000<tab>If thou art to weather these constant clashes against ever-more-potent primals, then thou must perforce arm thyself with extraordinary weapons. I have concluded negotiations with one Rowena, a merchant who doth abide at Revenant's Toll.
TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_URIANGER_000_001<tab>In exchange for the ritual objects thou hast collected, she hath promised to provide thee with a selection from her stock of unique armaments.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_URIANGER_000_002<tab>Why wouldst she consent to purchase these unsavory trophies? It is a simple question of infamy. Certain of her clientele are like to salivate at the very thought of possessing such forbidden items─there are few who can lay claim to the ownership of a ritual tool employed in the summoning of a primal.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_URIANGER_100_002<tab>There is no cause for alarum. Any power the objects once held has long since been surrendered to the summoned deities. And lest thou worry on my account, I have gleaned from them what wisdom we required.
TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_URIANGER_000_003<tab>I return to thee thy hard-won prizes. Hie thee to Revenant's Toll in Mor Dhona, and see them swiftly into Rowena's hands.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_ROWENA_000_010<tab>Greetin's, adventurer. So, you're the one as hopes to trade some primal curiosities, are you? Urianger's guaranteed their authenticity, so why don't you let ol' Rowena here have a look at these ritual objects o' yours?

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_ROWENA_000_011<tab>Hmmm, carved from beastman bones, just like he described... Well, I'd be lyin' if I said these trinkets didn't make my skin crawl like a diremite in my undergarments.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_ROWENA_000_012<tab>In case you misunderstand, that's an expression o' high praise, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. My customers'll be guttin' each other in the streets for a chance to purchase your trophies! Show them to Laraina, my acquisitions officer, and she'll walk you through the transaction.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_LARAINA_000_020<tab>Gods damn you, Rowena. You promised me a life of excitement in the exotic land of Mor Dhona, and here I am stocking your shelves like a trained opo─ Ahem. May I help you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>?
TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_LARAINA_000_021<tab>Ugh! What in the seven unholy hells are those gruesome things!? Beastman ritual tools?

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_LARAINA_000_022<tab>You adventurers and your penchant for stowing the most disgusting souvenirs in your packs! Blech. And that goes twice for Rowena for wanting to stock the stuff, and <var 1A 02 /var>thrice<var 1A 01 /var> for her addled customers for begging to buy it!

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_LARAINA_000_023<tab><sigh> But that's neither here nor there. Whatever it is that drives you folk also fills my purse with coin. Now, were you seeking to trade for aught in particular?
TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_LARAINA_000_024<tab>Ah, the special weapons we deal in, is it? Here, take a few of these tokens, and you'll be able to exchange them for any arms you fancy.

TEXT_GAIUSD015_01198_LARAINA_000_025<tab>If you're one of those <var 1A 02 /var>completionist<var 1A 01 /var> types, then you'll no doubt want an entire armory of the things! Just bring me another set of those stomach-churning ritual tools, and I'll see you rewarded with more tokens. Best hop to it!
